answerText: Home to Harlem[10] Home to Harlem is a novel by this Harlem Renaissance author of Banjo and Banana Bottom.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 15 | 18 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this novel has sex with Felice, a prostitute who gives him his $50 back. At the end of this novel, the protagonist's friend Zeddy claims that Felice is his woman. For 10 points each: [10] Name this work about Jake Brown, an army deserter who leaves his lover Rose.
